# Wydział Zarządzania AGH | Wydział Zarządzania AGH

URL: https://english.zarz.agh.edu.pl/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:10

Welcome to the AGH UST Faculty of Management website

We are an AGH UST unit that innovatively combines education at all academic levels with scientific research and the popularization of knowledge in the fields of management and modern technologies

NEWS

MBA TECH   

Lead the tech – Like never before! 

On March 31, 2023, the inauguration of the MBA TECH project took place at the Sheraton Hotel in Krakow. It was created on the initiative of the AGH University of Science and Technology and the Faculty of Management.

MBA TECH is an innovative program that merges the worlds of technology, engineering, computer science, and human sciences with business. The program is designed for business professionals who want to enhance their skills and knowledge in the tech industry. MBA TECH’s curriculum is focused on real-world applications, combining technical expertise with the business acumen needed to succeed in today’s fast-paced, technology-driven world. We place a strong emphasis on communication and HR, recognizing that strong leadership and interpersonal skills are essential for success in the technology industry. Throughout the program, the participants will have the opportunity to work on projects with real-world applications, collaborate with industry experts, and network with fellow professionals.

MBA TECH studies will be coordinated by the Faculty of Management: 
mba.agh.edu.pl

Please feel invited to one-of-a-kind MBA technical studies!

Cooperation agreement with ASTOR Sp. z o.o.  

On January 11, 2023, the AGH University of Science and Technology represented by the AGH Vice-Rector for Cooperation Professor Rafał Wiśniowski, concluded a cooperation agreement with ASTOR Sp. z o. o.

The cooperation includes i.e. familiarization with robotic workstations used in industry by the AGH students in the frame of study visits at the ASTOR Robotics Center and ASTOR Innovation Room showrooms as well as acquaint with the latest technological solutions offered by ASTOR.

On behalf of the AGH Faculty of Management, dr inż. Anita Proszowska is authorized to contact with ASTOR Sp. z o.o.

Dean’s Cup of the Faculty of Management 2023

On January 6-8, 2023, the Faculty Council of the Student Government organized the Dean’s Cup once again. Students – fans of winter madness competed on the Grapa Ski slope in Czarna Góra.

 Detailed report on the department’s Facebook page
: https://www.facebook.com/zarzadzanieagh

AGH-UST Job Fair 

During November 22 – 23, 2022 the autumn edition of the AGH Job Fair was held in at AGH UST. Students took part in 12 closed workshops conducted by practitioners from partner companies, listened to open speeches related to professional and personal development. They were able to consult their application documents with recruiters or take a professional CV photo.

The partners of the event included ABB, Aptiv, State Street, Andea. Detailed information available at: 
www.careerdays.agh.edu.pl

AGH UST alumni celebrated graduation

On November 26, 2022, nearly 100 of AGH UST alumni who obtained the title of Master of Arts in 2022 celebrated their graduation. This was the first official ceremony of this kind at our university, and we hope that it will establish a beautiful yearly tradition. The event included former students dressed in traditional togas and graduate caps from three faculties: Faculty of Applied Mathematics, Faculty of Management, and Faculty of Geo-Data Science, Geodesy, and Environmental Engineering.

More information on the website: 
https://www.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail/agh-ust-alumni-celebrated-graduation

100th Anniversary of Ferdynand Szwagrzyk’s birth – the first Dean of the Faculty of Management  

On April 16, 2022 was the hundredth anniversary of the birth of doc. dr. inż. Ferdynand Szwagrzyk – the initiator and first Dean of the Institute of Organization and Industry Management (1974 – 1980). In years 1980-1981 he served as  Dean of the Department of Organization and Industry Management, later renamed the Faculty of Management. 

On this occasion, the daughter and granddaughter of Mr. Szwagrzyk made us a pleasant  surprise and visited the Faculty of Management.

Cooperation between the UST-AGH Faculty of Management and the Lustration Labor Cooperative Association

On April 11, 2022, a meeting of the Dean of the Faculty of Management with representatives of the Lustration
 Labor Cooperative Association

was held. The meeting was arranged on the basis on the signed on March 9, 2022 agreement between the AGH University of Science and Technology (the Vice Rector for Cooperation) and Lustration 
Labor Cooperative Association
 (
the Chairman of the Board).

The parties declare their intention to cooperate in the field of educating students about cooperatives as a form of running a business, raising funds for research projects and initiating innovative activities in this area.

1st ITRI-AGH-IATI Meeting for development scientific cooperation 

We have a pleasure to announce that on April 7
th
 2022 a webinar organized by Faculty of Management AGH-IATI & Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) took place. 

The aim of this international meeting was to exchange knowledge and good practise between Poland and Taiwan, to strengthen the possible cooperation, exchange information and research and development and work on idea on common project between ITRI – the technology research and development institution in Taiwan (https://www.itri.org.tw/english/index.aspx) and the Faculty of Management AGH 

Cooperation agreement between the National Research Institute of Animal Production and the Faculty of Management

On February 3, 2022 a meeting of the Authorities of the AGH UST Faculty of Management and t
he National Research Institute of Animal Production 
took place. The meeting was the culmination of signing an agreement on cooperation between scientists from both units.

In mutual contacts Professor Jerzy Mikulik will represent the Faculty of Management and Andrzej Kaczor Ph.D. Sc. and Dorota Godyń Ph.D. Sc.  
the National Research Institute of Animal Production.

Cooperation agreement with Yabimo Sp. z o.o.

On January 10, 2022 the Dean of the Faculty of Management met with representatives of Yabimo Sp. z o.o. The meeting was aimed at establishing cooperation between the parties in the field of marketing research and supporting solutions for the implementation of circular economy models.

 The cooperation agreement was signed by the AGH-UST Vice-Rector for Cooperation and the President and Vice-President of the Management Board of Yabimo sp.z o.o.

Congratulatory letters for exceptional Faculty’s teachers 

The Authority of the Faculty of Management together with the Faculty Council of the Student Government selected and awarded four outstanding lecturers who had exhibited great commitment and full professionalism while conducting classes. Congratulations received:

Dr hab. inż. Jerzy Duda, prof. uczelni

Dr inż. Agnieszka Kabalska

Dr Jacek Wolak

Cooperation Agreement with Wastes Service Group

On November 9, 2021 another cooperation agreement with Wastes Service Group was signed. The aim of the cooperation between University of Science and Technology and Wasetes Service Group is the implementation of pilot projects in the field of innovative solutions in the electromobility sector. The Parties declare their intention and will to cooperate in projects implementation,  scientific and research work and exchange of ideas and experiences.

Faculty of Management’s scientific journals higher on the ministerial list

On December 1, 2021, the Minister of Science and Higher Education announced the updating list of scientific journals and the scores awarded to them.Our scientific journal Managerial Economics was re-entered on this list and received as many as 40 points. Decision Making in Manufacturing and Services received 20 points.

AGH-UST Job Fair

The AGH-UST Career Center invites you to participate in the autumn edition of the AGH Job Fair which will be held in a virtual formula on November 16-18, 2021. More information on: 
https://www.agh.edu.pl/en/info/article/agh-ust-job-fair-virtual-edition-autumn-2021/

 Companies or persons interested in participating are kindly requested to contact AGH Career Centre: 
tp@agh.edu.pl
.

Congratulations on the successful habilitation!

Dr Tomasz Wójtowicz  –  adjunct at the Department of Applications of Mathematics In Economics completed his habilitation. 
He was awarded the post-doctoral degree 
in the “Economics and Finance” discipline at the Cracow University of Economics.

21st International Conference „Corporate Governance – Theory and Practice”  

We would like to announce that on November 25-27, 2021 in Racławice the 21st International Conference „Corporate Governance – Theory and Practice” will take place. The 
honorary patronage
 over the event is taken by 
Rector of the AGH University of Science and Technology Professor Jerzy Lis.  

The AGH UST Faculty of Management and the Production Engineering Committee of the Polish Academy of Sciences are the organizers of this conference. More information on the conference website: 
http://www.kzp.zarz.agh.edu.pl/index_e.php

“Smart City for residents and environment”  

On October 21, 2021 the conference “Smart City for residents and environment”  was held in the International Culture Centre in Kraków.  This conference has begun a series of meetings and workshops entitled  “Social and environmental challenges in managing the development of cities and regions”.

The AGH UST Faculty of Management was the patron of this conference.

Joint project agreement called Energy Entrepreneurs in Action

We are pleased to announce that the AGH University of Science and Technology will run a new project ETEIA – Energy Transition Entrepreneurs in Action – developing a supportive academic environment for the young talents.

The project involves three Faculties of the AGH University of Science and Technology:

The Faculty of Energy and Fuels

Faculty of Civil Engineering and Resource Management

Faculty of Management

 The project coordinator at the Faculty of Management is Dr Wojciech Kowalik.

Management and Production Engineering – second place in the ranking of Engineering studies „Perspektywy”

Perspektywy University Ranking 2021 was published for the 22nd time: AGH University of Science and Technology 
holds a high fifth position 
in Poland. Ranking by subject (71 fields of study) was also prepared, thanks to which high school graduates will be able to choose those universities that provide them at the highest level.  In the field of Engineering our Management and Production Engineering field holds the second place.

Welcome to our Faculty!

Students of the Faculty of Management among the winners of the programming marathon on the occassion of the 60th anniversary of KGHM Polska Miedź S.A. 

CuValley Hack is the first hackathon organized by KGHM as part of the Copper Valley program. It’s our pleasure to inform that our students: Mateusz Jakubczak, Karol Oleszek and Krzysztof Olipra (team  DATA DRIVERS) won the first place in the category of 
STABILISATION OF THE FLASH FURNACE OPERATION.

Congratulations!

More details on: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0BUABSGySXw

Professor Joanna Kulczycka – among 25 Polish Sustainable Leaders on the Forbes Women list

Editors of „Forbes Women” together with a chapter of seven, composed of experts specializing in various aspects of sustainability, has prepared a list of nominees: Polish women who are particularly involved in education and specific activities for sustainable development – in homes, schools, companies, institutions, media.

We are pleased to announce that Prof. Kulczycka – the Deputy Dean for Cooperation and Development at the Faculty of Management was included in this group. Detailed information is available on the website: 

https://bomega.pl/25-polskich-liderek-zrownowazonego-rozwoju-lista-forbes-women/?fbclid=IwAR2pYHvF-JC-Zw8X-3_3Tej9klXwXuvxO2Up15Fy48xDKHDPLpaHf_R-oOg

An interesting interview in Polish with Professor Kulczycka available on our faculty YT channel: 
https://english.youtube.com/watch?v=ICPCxal61Mo

 Welcome to our official You Tube channel!

The largest engineering laboratory with 3D printers at the Faculty of Management

The Faculty of Management has opened a modern engineering laboratory for the needs of the field of study of Management and Production Engineering. The student laboratory, operating under the name of Engineering Innovation Lab (EIL) and holding a certificate of the American company MakerBot, which produces professional 3D printers, is intended for classes at two engineering courses offered by the Faculty of Management: Reverse Engineering and Rapid Prototyping. 

If you are interested please visit the university homepage : 
https://english.agh.edu.pl/info/article/najwieksza-pracownia-z-drukarkami-3d-w-agh/

Faculty of Management  in the CEEPUS program

Starting with the academic year 2020/2021 the Faculty of Management joined the Central European Exchange Program for University Studies. The main activity of CEEPUS is the support of knowledge transfer, knowledge exchange and experience through mobility grants for students and teachers. Currently, the Faculty of Management is a partner of the RAMSIS network – Intelligent Innovative Strategies for Raw Materials. Montanuniversitaet Leoben from Austria is the leader of this network. Moreover, it includes: University of Zagreb (Croatia), University of Belgrade (Serbia), 
Technical 
University
 of Košice (Slovakia) and 
University
 of Miskolc (Hungary). 

Dr Maciej Woźniak is the Faculty coordinator.
